verses.verse: Praise<WH1984> Yah!<WH3050> I will give thanks<WH3034> to Yahweh<WH3050> with my whole heart,<WH3824> in the council<WH5475> of the upright,<WH3477> and in the congregation.<WH5712>
Yahweh<WH3068>'s works<WH4639> are great,<WH1419> pondered<WH1875> by all those who delight in them.<WH2656>
His work<WH6467> is honor<WH1935> and majesty.<WH1926> His righteousness<WH6666> endures<WH5975> forever.<WH5703>
He has caused<WH6213> his wonderful works<WH6381> to be remembered.<WH2143> Yahweh<WH3068> is gracious<WH2587> and merciful.<WH7349>
He has given<WH5414> food<WH2964> to those who fear<WH3373> him.<WH5769> He always remembers<WH2142> his covenant.<WH1285>
He has shown<WH5046> his people<WH5971> the power<WH3581> of his works,<WH4639> in giving<WH5414> them the heritage<WH5159> of the nations.<WH1471>
The works<WH4639> of his hands<WH3027> are truth<WH571> and justice.<WH4941> All his precepts<WH6490> are sure.<WH539>
They are established<WH5564> forever<WH5703> and ever.<WH5703> They are done<WH6213> in truth<WH571> and uprightness.<WH3477>
He has sent<WH7971> redemption<WH6304> to his people.<WH5971> He has ordained<WH6680> his covenant<WH1285> forever.<WH5769> His name<WH8034> is holy<WH6918> and awesome!<WH3372>

The fear<WH3374> of Yahweh<WH3068> is the beginning<WH7225> of wisdom.<WH2451> All those who do<WH6213> his work have a good<WH2896> understanding.<WH7922> His praise<WH8416> endures<WH5975> forever!<WH5703>
